name: 天台物语 Rooftop Story
description:
An epidemic strikes, and the city enters a state of lockdown. As a community volunteer, what would you do in the face of a shortage of supplies?

grow vegetables or fruit
Vegetables or fruits can be grown in the vegetable garden on the roof.
Wait for the crops to ripen to sell or make dishes by taking good care of them!

raising livestock
Animals such as chickens and pigs can be raised on the rooftop facility.
After careful feeding, the bred animals will continue to produce eggs and meat!

Gathering and Fishing
The green space and landscape pool in the community will provide you with a lot of wild vegetables and fish!

enhance relationship
Meet the various needs of residents in the community!
As your relationship deepens, you can unlock various facilities in the game and gain abilities.

Maintain an optimistic attitude, and work together with the residents of the community to tide over the difficulties.
